column4: i re-installed nautilus but it didn't fix it! are you all using nautilus by default??
What is the problem?
when i scroll up it all gets messy :(
But you can scroll down?
when i first begin with scrollin down everything is ok, but when i need to scroll up it all gets messy even if i scroll down again!!
Have you tried adding a new user and see if that new user has the same problem?
do you thing i have to stop using nautilus? choose something else? nope i didnt do with a new user!
Just to rule out that you do not have any config files that is messing up
yup , that's possible . u right. are u using nautilus u yourself??
Can you also take of screen shot when it happens? Every gnome user use nautilus by default so yes
do you mean you want a screenshot of it?
yes.
ok. give me a sec!
this is what it looks like at the beginnin?   --->   http://imagebin.org/96668
my trouble when i scroll up! ---->http://imagebin.org/96670     :((
same pb when i scrool down again --->  http://imagebin.org/96671
I though so it is a know bug. The thing to fix this is to disable preview (tumbnail) on the images
really?! owkay
Well you can wait for the images to finish displaying
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/nautilus/+bug/401840
no its not a matter of time i think , the images still the same; the only thing i have to do when it's like that is to refresh or change tab
